import React from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; import coffeeBg from "../assets/coffee-bg.jpg"; const Services = () => { const services = [ { id: 1, title: "Dine-In Service" }, { id: 2, title: "Takeaway/Parcel" }, { id: 3, title: "Online Ordering" }, { id: 4, title: "Custom Coffee Orders" }, { id: 5, title: "Snacks & Bakery Items" }, { id: 6, title: "Free Wi-Fi" }, { id: 7, title: "Loyalty Program" }, { id: 8, title: "Events/Live Music" }, { id: 9, title: "Seasonal Specials" }, { id: 10, title: "Gift Cards/Merchandise" } ]; return (

Our Services

{services.map((service) => (
{service.id}

{service.title}

))}

About Our Services

We offer a wide range of services to enhance your coffee experience. From convenient takeaway options to special events, we have something for every coffee lover. Enjoy our free Wi-Fi while you work or relax, or join our loyalty program to earn rewards with every purchase.

); }; export default Services;
